content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
• No new composite structures have been successfully placed on the map during these steps. Although operations to process resources were executed using pre‐existing furnaces (an iron furnace at (5.0, 5.0) and a copper furnace at (–27.0, –60.0)), these were not built by the agent.
• Multiple attempts were made to locate, craft, and place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs for research, but none of these attempts succeeded due to resource shortages and placement failures.

ERROR TIPS
• API Usage Errors for get_entities:
 – Do not pass unsupported keyword arguments (e.g., “radius”) or extraneous positional arguments. Confirm the expected signature before invoking.
• Lab Placement and Crafting Failures:
 – Verify that the Lab is available in the inventory before attempting to place it.
 – Ensure all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available before initiating Lab crafting.
• Handling Non-Iterable Returns:
 – When filtering entities (e.g., via list comprehensions), check that the source is iterable. Implement fallbacks to convert any None returns to an empty list.
• Resource Availability Checks:
 – Pre-assess and secure sufficient resources (including smelted outputs and intermediate products) to meet the complete requirements for crafting complex items like the Lab before beginning production.
